formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A VALUE ERROR in LiftConsts[5] occurs with the following message.

listitem.screen: LiftConsts[5] v←mkv¨⍳+/s←2</0,l ⍝ Variables we need; start of literals

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: The binding switched from MkV to mkv but the transition didn't make it it to the definition site, so changing the name will fix this.
